pageProduct.name: QV Intensive Cleanser 500G
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Intensive Moisturising Cleanser is a gentle soap free cleanser that is enriched with moisturisers making it ideal for extremely dry  skin.  It leaves a protective moisturising film on your skin and is lightly foaming.  QV Intensive Moisturising Cleanser is suitable for dry, sensitive, itchy skin and eczema.Suitable for extremely dry skin.Dermatologists recommend.Soap free.Preservative free.Non-comedogenic - won't block pores.Fragrance and colour free.Dermatologically tested.

Warnings

Avoid eyes.  If cleanser enters eyes, rinse with clean water immediately.  If irritation occurs discontinue use.

Common Uses

QV Intensive Moisturising Cleanser is suitable for dry, sensitive, itchy skin and eczema.Suitable for extremely dry skin.

Ingredients

Glycerin, aqua (water), sodium lauroyl sarsosinate, disodium cocoamphodiacetate, lauroyl betaine, sodium cocoyl isehionate, acrylates / C10-30 alkyl acrylate crosspolymer, styrene/acrylates copolymer, aminomethyl propanol.

Directions

For best results use daily in the shower.  Massage onto your wet body, rinse and pat dry.Use in conjunction with QV Intensive Body Moisturiser after showering.
